# netbird_dns_zone (Data Source)

Read DNS Zone information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "netbird_dns_zone" "example" {
  name = "example-zone"
}

# Query by ID
data "netbird_dns_zone" "by_id" {
  id = "zone-id-here"
}

# Query by domain
data "netbird_dns_zone" "by_domain" {
  domain = "example.local"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `domain` (String) Zone domain (FQDN)
- `id` (String) DNS Zone ID
- `name` (String) DNS Zone name identifier

### Read-Only

- `distribution_groups` (Set of String) Group IDs that define groups of peers that will resolve this zone
- `enable_search_domain` (Boolean) Enable this zone as a search domain
- `enabled` (Boolean) DNS Zone status
